notables.name: Mistress of Sacrifice
mods: Your Offering Skills also affect you
Your Offerings have 50% reduced Effect on you
40% increased Skill Effect Duration

notables.name: Essence Glutton
mods: For each nearby corpse, you and nearby Allies Regenerate 0.2% of Energy Shield per second, up to 2.0% per second
For each nearby corpse, you and nearby Allies Regenerate 5 Manaper second, up to 50 per second
Regenerate 8% of Energy Shield over 2 seconds when you Consume a corpse
Regenerate 4% of Mana over 2 seconds when you Consume a corpse

notables.name: Commander of Darkness
mods: Auras from your Skills grant 3% increased Attack and CastSpeed to you and Allies
You and nearby Allies deal 30% increased Damage
You and nearby Allies have +30% to Elemental Resistances
(Auras can only grant bonuses to things they affect)

notables.name: Plaguebringer
mods: If you've Consumed a corpse Recently, you and your Minions have 30% increased Area of Effect
With at least one nearby corpse, you and nearby Allies deal 10% more Damage
With at least one nearby corpse, nearby Enemies deal 10% reduced Damage
(Recently refers to the past 4 seconds)

notables.name: Corpse Pact
mods: 4% increased Attack and Cast Speed for each corpse Consumed Recently, up to a maximum of 200%
Enemies near corpses you Spawned Recently are Chilled and Shocked
(Recently refers to the past 4 seconds)
(Killing an Enemy is not Spawning a corpse)
(Shock increases Damage taken by 15%)
(Chill reduces Enemy Action Speed by 10%)

notables.name: Mindless Aggression
mods: Minions have 20% more Maximum Life
Minions deal 10% more Damage

notables.name: Unnatural Strength
mods: Minions have Unholy Might
(Unholy Might grants 100% of Physical Damage converted to Chaos Damage and 25% chance to apply Withered on Hit)

notables.name: Bone Barrier
mods: 1% additional Physical Damage Reduction per Minion, up to 10%
1% of Damage Dealt by your Minions is Leeched to you as Life
Minions gain 40% of Maximum Life as Extra Maximum Energy Shield

notables.name: Mastermind of Discord
mods: Exposure you inflict applies an extra -25% to the affected Resistance
Regenerate 1% of Mana per second if you've inflicted Exposure Recently
(Recently refers to the past 4 seconds)

notables.name: Heart of Destruction
mods: Gain Convergence when you Hit a Unique Enemy, no more than once every 8 seconds
60% increased Area of Effect while you don't have Convergence
(Convergence grants 30% more Elemental Damage and lasts 4 seconds)

notables.name: Bastion of Elements
mods: Triggers Level 20 Primal Aegis when AllocatedPrimal Aegis can take 75 Elemental Damage per Allocated Notable Passive Skill
Other Aegis Skills are Disabled
Cannot take Reflected Elemental Damage

(Primal Aegis calls forth a protective aegis which takes elemental damage from hits for you until depleted. The aegis will be restored to its full value after a short delay if you stop taking elemental damage from hits, or if depleted)

notables.name: Bringer of Ruin
mods: 66% increased Effect of Herald Buffs on you
66% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Herald Skills

notables.name: Shaper of Flames
mods: Hits always Ignite
All Damage can Ignite
Enemies Ignited by you have 40% of Physical Damage they deal converted to Fire
(Ignite deals Fire Damage over time, based on the base Fire Damage of the Skill, for 4 seconds)

notables.name: Shaper of Storms
mods: Hits always Shock
Shocks from your Hits always increase Damage taken by at least 25%
All Damage can Shock
(Shock increases Damage taken by up to 50%, depending on the amount of Lightning Damage in the hit, for 2 seconds)

notables.name: Shaper of Winter
mods: All Damage with Hits can Chill
Your Chills can reduce Action Speed by up to a maximum of 40%
Enemies Chilled by your Hits lessen their Damage dealt by half of Chill Effect
(Chill reduces Enemy Action Speed by up to 30%, depending on the amount of Cold Damage in the hit, for 2 seconds)

notables.name: Liege of the Primordial
mods: Summoned Golems are Immune to Elemental Damage
50% increased Effect of Buffs granted by your Golems
Summoned Golems are Resummoned 4 seconds after being Killed
+2 to maximum number of Summoned Golems

notables.name: Vile Bastion
mods: Regenerate 100 Energy Shield per second
Cannot Be Stunned while you have Energy Shield
Maximum Energy Shield is increased by Chance to Block Spell Damage

notables.name: Void Beacon
mods: Nearby Enemies have -20% to Cold Resistance
Nearby Enemies have -20% to Chaos Resistance
Nearby Enemies have 100% reduced Life Regeneration rate

notables.name: Forbidden Power
mods: 6% increased Area of Effect per Power Charge
6% increased Damage per Power Charge
Gain a Power Charge after Spending a total of 200 Mana
+1 to Maximum Power Charges
occultist_power_charge_on_mana_spent

notables.name: Withering Presence
mods: +60% to Chaos Resistance
15% more Chaos Damage
Every second, inflict Withered on nearby Enemies for 15 seconds
(Withered applies 6% increased Chaos Damage Taken, and can be inflicted up to 15 times)
Nearby Hindered Enemies deal 15% reduced Damage over Time
(Withered applies 6% increased Chaos Damage Taken, and can be inflicted up to 15 times)

notables.name: Frigid Wake
mods: Cannot be Chilled
Cannot be Frozen
15% more Cold Damage
Every 4 seconds, 50% chance to Freeze nearby Non-Frozen Enemies for 0.4 seconds
Nearby Chilled Enemies deal 10% reduced Damage with Hits
(Freeze lowers Enemy Action Speed to zero, preventing them from acting. Duration is based on the Cold Damage of the Hit)

notables.name: Profane Bloom
mods: Cursed Enemies you or your Minions Kill have a 50% chance to Explode, dealing a quarter of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage

notables.name: Unholy Authority
mods: You can apply an additional Curse
Your Hexes can affect Hexproof Enemies
